name: 100 hidden eternals
description:
Art by Anatoliy Loginovskikh


Important information
  • Press "N" for night mode.
  • Press "Del" then "Esc" to reset all achievements.

Hidden object game in a surreal style.
Black and white hand-drawn style.
Animated puzzles.
Mind blown.

In the game you need to find 100 hidden eternals - the idols in the form of men.
Some eternals are easy, some are hidden in puzzles.
Remember that puzzles require extraordinary thinking!
